title: SOLD (1897 El Principe De Gales Advertising Envelope - PERFECT to accompany T206's)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD (1897 El Principe De Gales Advertising Envelope - PERFECT to accompany T206's)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
I've never seen another piece like this one. Postally used in 1897, this envelope has on the reverse, in deep red print, an enormous El Principe de Gales advertisement. You practically need sunglasses to look at it. It's absolutely perfect to display with an El Principe de Gales-backed T206. $125 or best offer.

[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/epdg1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/epdg2.jpg[/IMG]
